title: Serif font—Lost&Found
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162937im_/http:/typophile.com/files/L&F_6106.jpg)

Font: 

 Arno Pro 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162937/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Emma-L

comments.content: **[Arno Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162937/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Arno%20Pro%20-%20Display&fid=f7620f51ad0d0ab2cda1a5b3f0ca0b74&fsize=60&text=In%20The%20Beginning%20There%20Was%20Sound%3B%20To%20Become%2C&wrap=2)** (Subhead or Display) using some **[alternate glyphs](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162937/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/arno/subhead/glyphs.html)** for /e /h /t /r etc
